hero.title: Ecommerce Specialist
hero.subtitle: I am a specialist in design and development of e-commerce websites. I have been working with several companies over the years helping them carry out their e-commerce projects.

contact.title: You can contact me right now!

companies.title: What kind of companies do I work with?
list: Small business that are starting in the ecommerce field and want to stay with the right foot.
Medium size business that are already selling online and want to improve their stores by optimizing their customer experience.
Marketing agencies, startups and other digital companies that need an extra hand for their project.
Big companies that need a custom approach for the ecommerce experience that they want to bring to their customers.
